Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-21718 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.78.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-21718 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.78.1-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.78.1-3, affected by CVE-2025-21718
